name: RM - Painting - High Renaissance
prompt: classic oil painting of {prompt} in the style of High Renaissance . sfumato technique, masterful realistic volume, balanced harmonic composition, soft ethereal lighting, classical grandeur, refined aesthetic, masterpiece oil technique, subtle gradations
negative_prompt: abstract, distorted, messy, modern, neon, flat, pixelated, low resolution

name: RM - Painting - Baroque
prompt: dramatic oil painting of {prompt} in the style of Baroque . intense chiaroscuro lighting, deep theatrical shadows, high-contrast emotional intensity, dynamic motion, rich tactile texture, masterfully staged illumination, Caravaggio-esque depth
negative_prompt: bright, flat, static, pastel, cute, anime, vector, simple, white background

name: RM - Painting - Rococo
prompt: ornate oil painting of {prompt} in the style of Rococo . soft pastel palette, playful decorative elegance, intricate ornamentation, airy lighthearted atmosphere, romantic whimsy, delicate brushwork, ethereal charm, lush detailing
negative_prompt: dark, gritty, gothic, sharp angles, masculine, heavy, horror, industrial

name: RM - Painting - Romanticism
prompt: emotional oil painting of {prompt} in the style of Romanticism . sublime atmospheric drama, intense emotional depth, turbulent mists and fog, majestic scale, moody awe-inspiring lighting, spiritual intensity, expressive naturalism
negative_prompt: urban, modern, bright, pop art, cartoon, geometric, structured, calm

name: RM - Painting - Impressionism
prompt: oil painting of {prompt} in the style of Impressionism . loose distinct brushstrokes, vibrant dappled light, unblended chromatic brilliance, open composition, fleeting atmospheric moment, plein air luminosity, soft optical blending
negative_prompt: photorealistic, sharp lines, black outlines, dark, studio lighting, smooth

name: RM - Painting - Post-Impressionism
prompt: expressive oil painting of {prompt} in the style of Post-Impressionism . thick impasto texture, bold saturated color palette, emotional rhythmic swirls, distinct stylized brushwork, turbulent energy, vivid tactile surface, distinctive artistic vision
negative_prompt: smooth, realistic, photograph, flat, dull colors, subtle, refined

name: RM - Painting - Art Nouveau
prompt: decorative art illustration of {prompt} in the style of Art Nouveau . elegant organic curves, flowing whiplash lines, stylized decorative patterns, intricate gold leaf accents, harmonious ornamental composition, aesthetic flatness, romantic complexity
negative_prompt: geometric, industrial, brutalist, modern, minimalism, straight lines, rigid

name: RM - Painting - Art Deco
prompt: elegant art deco illustration of {prompt} . sleek geometric stylization, streamlined elegance, bold angular outlines, metallic gold and brass contrasts, luxurious modernist aesthetic, symmetrical precision, polished decorative surface
negative_prompt: organic, rustic, messy, grunge, medieval, rough, sketch, blurred, floral

name: RM - Painting - Cubism
prompt: abstract painting of {prompt} in the style of Cubism . fragmented geometric abstraction, simultaneous multiple viewpoints, interlocking faceted planes, muted monochromatic tones, structural deconstruction, avant-garde composition
negative_prompt: realistic, 3d, depth, smooth, curved, organic, traditional, photorealistic

name: RM - Painting - Surrealism
prompt: dreamlike oil painting of {prompt} in the style of Surrealism . dreamlike hyper-realistic technique, impossible logic, eerie subconscious atmosphere, bizarre juxtapositions, distinct clarity, melting fluid forms, uncanny psychological depth
negative_prompt: logical, mundane, realistic, boring, standard, blurry, abstract expressionism

name: RM - Painting - Expressionism
prompt: emotional painting of {prompt} in the style of German Expressionism . raw emotional distortion, bold jarring color palette, angular woodcut aesthetic, psychological anxiety, turbulent brushwork, intense expressive mood, dramatic stylized forms
negative_prompt: realistic, calm, peaceful, beautiful, pretty, detailed, smooth

name: RM - Painting - Abstract Expressionism
prompt: chaotic abstract painting of {prompt} in the style of Abstract Expressionism . chaotic kinetic energy, spontaneous action painting, visceral drips and splashes, energetic gestural brushwork, non-representational intensity, raw emotional expression, monumental scale
negative_prompt: representational, figure, portrait, realistic, detailed, neat, orderly

name: RM - Painting - Pop Art
prompt: bold screen print art of {prompt} in the style of Pop Art . bold commercial aesthetic, vibrant primary colors, stylized ben-day dots, thick graphic outlines, flat mass-produced look, high-impact screen print style, ironic visual punch
negative_prompt: painterly, loose, textured, watercolor, realistic, dark, old fashioned

name: RM - Painting - Watercolor
prompt: soft watercolor painting of {prompt} . translucent fluid layers, delicate wet-on-wet bleed, organic paper texture, soft chromatic transitions, artistic splatter, airy negative space, ethereal washed aesthetic
negative_prompt: oil paint, thick acrylic, digital, sharp, heavy, dark, opaque

name: RM - Painting - Oil Impasto
prompt: thick oil painting of {prompt} . heavy sculptural impasto, thick palette knife application, deep dimensional relief, rich tactile surface, expressive energetic strokes, viscous oil texture, dimensional depth

name: RM - Painting - Edward Hopper
